summary: This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs of Winged Chocobos with the fire of the forge, and quickly create a horde of baby Chocobos (5, 15, 50, 100 ...) that are following you as if you were their mother
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b]Incubated Winged Chocobos [/b][/color][color=#00ff00][b]version 1.2[/b][/color]. No DLC required

[color=#00ff00] Optional File: Esp Version Française [/color]

This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs of Winged Chocobos with the fire of the forge, and quickly create a horde of baby Chocobos (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !) that are following you as if you were their mother !

To obtain these chocobo eggs, simply bring any “Winged Chocobo Egg ” (found in the chocobo nests in the 5 towns + with some merchants*) to a forge and create the "Incubated Winged Chocobo Egg" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into baby Chocobos. The baby Chocobos follow you !

5 Towns, 5 Breeds of Chocobos, 5 Colors

*[color=#ff0000][b]Merchants[/b][/color]

Yellow Chocobo in Whiterun (Merchants: Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare)

Green Chocobo in Riften (Merchants: Keeravia at the Bee and Barb, Elgrim at Elgrim’s Elixirs, Marise Aravel, Vekel at the Ragged Flagorn in the Ratways)

Red Chocobo in Solitude (Merchants: Angeline at Angeline’s Aromatics, Corpulus at Winking Skeever, Sayma at Bits and Pieces, Addvar)

Blue Chocobo in Windhelm (Merchants: Elda at the Candlehearth, Ambarys at the Corner Club, Quintus at the White Phial, Revyn Sadri, Hillevi)

Black Chocobo in Markarth (Merchants: Kleppr in the Silver Blood Inn and Bothela in the Hags Cure)


You have 6 Mounts in this mod (in the 5 towns)


You have also my two mods with the Chocobos: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28785/?] Chocobos Mounts and Followers [/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35436/?] Summon Blacks Mounts Chocobos with Music [/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/aSDIgXf.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b] INSTALLATION[/b][/color]

If you have my other mods with Incubated Eggs: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55592/?]Incubated Eggs[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76666/?]Curious Birds Mounts and Armies [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76681/?]Chimeras Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76864/?]New Gryphons Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76818/?]Snails and Slugs of Skyrim[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77311/?]Repopulate with Mushrooms[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73785/?]Griffins Mounts and Armies[/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68187/?]Gerbils Mounts and Followers [/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68832/?] Skaven Mounts and Followers [/url]or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55520/?] Incubated Winged Chocobos [/url], in order to find these eggs at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game.

[color=#00ff00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#00ff00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not



[color=#ff0000][b] Bugs or Problems[/b][/color]

No fast travels with the army of baby chocobos !

They tend to be blocked by city doors

When the chocobo is in battle, it approaches the enemy and just stand their and lets itself be attacked and it doesn't fight back (there is no animation in the game for the chickens/chocobos to fight)

[i] For the mounts:[/i]

The Chocobo can’t jump, fly or swim…

To turn easily,it is better to walk ! ...

If you dismount in the water, it is possible to swim in the air !! Solution: MOUNT AGAIN or SPACEBAR



[color=#ff0000] [size="6"] [b]Credits [/b][/size][/color]

Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5619180 ] Vie101010 [/url]for the meshe (Derivative work based on the original chocobo model in "Final Fantasy 10" of "Square Enix") and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3516810 ] messiasmummo[/url] for the texture of the Gold Chocobo

[url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4899950 ]Me (gg77) [/url]for the structure of the mod, the modificated skeletons of the Chickens/Chocobos,the feathers and the nests with the eggs (based on the models of the vanilla game), the textures of the yellow, black, blue, red, green, winged chocobos (based on the texture of messiasmummo).

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=534711642.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/534711642.jpg[/img][/url]

Special thanks to [color=#ff0000] Billy Mays[/color] with his mod [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=276280477] Creepy Crawly - Army of Spiders [/url] who has inspired my mod !
author: gg77
